name: VoiceAnnouncer
author: NR
description: Replaces many audio notifications with voice announcements, for actions like mute, unmute, connect, disconnect, etc.

items: Bug fixed where the default sounds of discord wouldn't be turned off by the plugin in some cases
Added a setting (on by default) that will overwrite notification settings to disable discord's stock sounds that the plugin replaces with voice announcements
Added a voice announcement for when someone joins current voice channel
Added a voice announcement for when someone leaves current voice channel
Added a voice announcement for when the user joins a voice channel
Added a voice announcement for when the user leaves a voice channel
Added a voice announcement for when the user switches between voice channels
Added a voice announcement for when the user deafened or undeafened themselves
Changed how the voice setting works, now there is a dropdown selector with the list of voices.
Added an option to use female voice.
Added a streamer mode respecting setting.

settings.name: Voice notification volume
settings.note: Adjust the volume of the audio notifications.

settings.name: Respect Streamer Mode's disable sounds setting
settings.note: If enabled VoiceMutedAnnouncer will only make an announcement if "Streamer Mode" is disabled or if "Disable sounds" is set to false in "Streamer Mode" settings.

settings.name: Disable Discord's stock sounds
settings.note: If true the default/stock/native sounds that discord makes will be disabled by overwriting your settings to make space for the voice announcements. This setting will overwrite discord's notification settings the the current session but the plugin will try to restore original settings when disabled.

settings.name: Connected
settings.note: Announcement when you connect to a voice channel.

settings.name: Disconnected
settings.note: Announcement when you disconnect from a voice channel.

settings.name: Channel Switched
settings.note: Announcement when you switch to a different voice channel.

settings.name: Muted
settings.note: Announcement when you muted your microphone.

settings.name: Unmuted
settings.note: Announcement when you unmuted your microphone.

settings.name: Deafened
settings.note: Announcement when you deafened your audio.

settings.name: Undeafened
settings.note: Announcement when you undeafened your audio.

settings.name: User Joined Your Channel
settings.note: Announcement when a user joins your voice channel.

settings.name: User Left Your Channel
settings.note: Announcement when a user leaves your voice channel.
